CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.2)

PROJECT(raknet)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_RAKNET_LIB)

IF(WIN32)
	ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS -D_WINSOCK_DEPRECATED_NO_WARNINGS)
ENDIF()

FILE(GLOB LIBRAKNET_INC source/*.h)
FILE(GLOB LIBRAKNET_SRC source/*.cpp)

ADD_LIBRARY(raknet STATIC ${LIBRAKNET_SRC})

INSTALL(TARGETS raknet
        LIBRARY DESTINATION lib
        ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib)
INSTALL(FILES ${LIBRAKNET_INC}
	DESTINATION include)
